channel.title: CVE Feed for PluginOps -- Landing Page Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PluginOps -- Landing Page Builder

item.title: CVE-2023-40675|2024-09-23T12:52:52.277Z -- pluginops -- landing%20page%20builder
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PluginOps Landing Page Builder plugin <=Â 1.5.1.2 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-43345|2024-08-19T19:42:36.943Z -- pluginops -- landing%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in PluginOps Landing Page Builder allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Landing Page Builder: from n/a through 1.5.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-34752|2024-08-02T02:59:21.930Z -- pluginops -- landing%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PluginOps Landing Page Builder allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Landing Page Builder: from n/a through 1.5.1.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-30452|2024-07-05T17:22:22.244Z -- pluginops -- landing%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PluginOps Landing Page Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Landing Page Builder: from n/a through 1.5.1.7.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PluginOps Landing Page Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Landing Page Builder: from n/a through 1.5.1.7.
